column1: The 99 Ford Explorer Sport is a FUN  fairly affordable  and safe vehicle  It is easy to drive and rides very smoothly for a truck based vehicle  The inside is easy to use and looks nice  complete with fun and handy compartments and buttons  Because there are so many options  it is very individual and suits personal needs  I bought the car over other SUVs because of its wonderful safety records and have been very impressed with its performance since  Contrary to belief about 2 door SUVs  the back is very roomy and comfortable  It has everything i need br br
